message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to you today. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $950000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your desire to save, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $925000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand your desire to save, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $925000. I'm willing to make a small concession, though. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $915000. What do you think?
